original_text: Howbeit the high places were not taken away: as yet the people did sacrifice and burnt incense on the high places.
korean_text: 오직 산당들을 제거하지 아니하였으므로 백성이 여전히 산당에서 제사를 드리며 분향하였더라

sentences.original_text: Howbeit the high places were not taken away
as yet the people did sacrifice
and burnt incense on the high places
